item.title: UK will 'never let up' on Ukraine support, says Starmer
item.description: It is the prime minister's first visit to Ukraine since taking office six months ago.

item.title: Dozens killed as Israeli strikes continue ahead of Gaza ceasefire
item.description: More than 60 people have reportedly been killed ahead of the deal coming into force.

item.title: What we know about the Gaza ceasefire deal
item.description: What we know so far about the ceasefire deal agreed between Israel and Hamas.

item.title: Biden warns of dangers of oligarchy taking shape in US
item.description: The outgoing president used his final televised speech from the Oval Office to issue a series of warnings.

item.title: Tanzania denies suspected Marburg outbreak after WHO alert
item.description: Samples analysed in all suspected cases are negative for Marburg virus, Tanzania's health minister says.
